'''Gourmet Tour''' is a series of videos released by official ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' media featuring the creation in real life of in-game [[dishes]]. They are available as a [https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqWr7dyJNgLKKHue5UOEdwdn7jqZnp09H playlist] on the official Genshin Impact YouTube channel.
